name: Kana Yama
description:
Controls Spacebar - Activate Skill Attack (when it is full)
M - Use fan to nudge the pieces
Esc - Pauses the game

Practice your reading of Hiragana and Katakana with Kana Yama （かな山）!

  • Match the hiragana or katakana with the correct romaji to create a chain!
  • Continue the chain to score more points
  • Make chains quickly to keep your combo up!
  • Use bombs and your skill attack to help destroy more pieces!

Take the game with you by downloading it from Google Play!
